backend/main.mo: Actor defines data models, persistent maps, authorization mixin, and rate-limiting plus session/OTP handling for clients and admin.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old client accounts to a new format by adding role and createdAt fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing features, related source files, components, and test IDs for signup UI and protected client dashboard.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file of prewritten summaries describing behaviors of various frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer with OKLCH color variables and dark-mode theme tokens for global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling admin/client authentication flows, shipment tracking, quote form, and conditional client portal rendering.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminClien: Admin view showing client info and tabs for managing shipments and invoices.
Form for validating a client principal and updating or creating client profile details using admin actions.
Dialog workflow for provisioning a new client account with email/mobile login and a generated temporary password.
Displays a searchable list of clients and allows selecting a client to view details.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Admin control panel with tabs for managing clients, adding clients, MSG91 settings, and invoice exports.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminInvoi: Button that triggers invoice export to CSV and downloads the generated file.
Shows invoices for a client and supports creating invoices, downloading PDFs, and sending WhatsApp reminders.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMsg91: UI for saving MSG91 API keys and verifying access tokens with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoleM: Admin-only interface to grant or revoke admin privileges using principal IDs with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminShipm: Displays a client's shipments and provides a dialog for creating new shipments.
frontend/src/components/AdminTrackingPan: File is empty or placeholder with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Static screen shown when a user lacks permission to access a section.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBootst: Deprecated card indicating Internet Identity admin bootstrap is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLoginC: Password-based admin login form with validation, loading state, and error display.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLogout: Button that logs out an admin and scrolls back to the home section.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Deprecated Internet Identity login component that renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Deprecated profile setup dialog that returns null.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientDas: Client dashboard showing shipments and invoices with logout support and tab navigation.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientInv: Displays a client’s invoices with status badges and actions for downloading PDFs or paying pending invoices.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPas: Provides a form for clients to change their password with validation and backend mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPor: Wraps login and signup tabs for the client portal, switching views after successful signup.
Handles client login via password or OTP, including validation, OTP sending, and authentication flows.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientShi: Fetches and displays active and delivered client shipments in separate tables with loading states.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientSig: Renders a signup form with validation and submits new client accounts to the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Provides hooks to check if admin is bootstrapped and to bootstrap the first admin, invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin authentication token lifecycle, including login, logout, validation, and local storage handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientSession.ts: Handles client session token storage, validation, and clearing using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, exposing identity state and login/logout controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for validating admin sessions and performing admin and client operations for clients, shipments, and invoices.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles, color variables, dark mode themes, and custom gold utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/invoicePdf.ts: Generates a printable HTML invoice in a new window and triggers browser print for PDF export.
frontend/src/lib/shipmentsStorage.ts: Empty placeholder file for shipment storage utilities.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Creates WhatsApp reminder deep links by formatting mobile numbers and generating encoded reminder messages.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/utils/clientAuthErrors.ts: Maps backend authentication error messages to short user-friendly client messages with fallbacks and logging for unmapped errors.
frontend/src/utils/clientIdentifier.ts: Validates and normalizes email or mobile identifiers, returning structured results with specific user-facing error messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL including hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, features, architecture notes, and pending feature requests for implementing MySQL-backed authentication and protected client dashboard flows.
